text: Greenlaw is an unincorporated community in Tangipahoa Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located N of Amite City, Louisiana. ==Name origin== The community is named after a local sawmill owned by Edward Runnels Greenlaw who owned and operated the Greenlaw Lumber Company. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Tangipahoa Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Greenlaw, Louisiana
